anyOf.description:
A URL that can be accessed by the webview when using the HTTP APIs. Wildcards can be used following the URL pattern standard.

See [the URL Pattern spec](https://urlpattern.spec.whatwg.org/) for more information.

Examples:

- "https://*" : allows all HTTPS origin on port 443

- "https://*:*" : allows all HTTPS origin on any port

- "https://*.github.com/tauri-apps/tauri": allows any subdomain of "github.com" with the "tauri-apps/api" path

- "https://myapi.service.com/users/*": allows access to any URLs that begins with "https://myapi.service.com/users/"

url.description:
A URL that can be accessed by the webview when using the HTTP APIs. Wildcards can be used following the URL pattern standard.

See [the URL Pattern spec](https://urlpattern.spec.whatwg.org/) for more information.

Examples:

- "https://*" : allows all HTTPS origin on port 443

- "https://*:*" : allows all HTTPS origin on any port

- "https://*.github.com/tauri-apps/tauri": allows any subdomain of "github.com" with the "tauri-apps/api" path

- "https://myapi.service.com/users/*": allows access to any URLs that begins with "https://myapi.service.com/users/"
